name: The Big Gigantic Battle between the Not-So-Miniscule Moon and the Stupid Smoldering Sun
name_original: The Big Gigantic Battle between the Not-So-Miniscule Moon and the Stupid Smoldering Sun
description:
The Big Gigantic Battle between the Not-So-Miniscule Moon and the Stupid Smoldering Sun is a game developed by blunket. It was originally released in 2018.
The Big Gigantic Battle between the Not-So-Miniscule Moon and the Stupid Smoldering Sun is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
